name: A Tale in The Nile
description:
A Tale in The Nile is an adventure game set in Ancient Egypt. You will live a fun and controversial story told by old friends Kashto and Nofre.

Get ready to discover the incredible Nile Delta, from the famous plantations, villages, and even temples where challenging creatures will always be awaiting for you.

The game is also available for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.com.andresjesse.P20Official
